name: flower manor
description:
flower manor was my very first twine game, made for the same creative writing class in which i made no exit. this was a very fun and expansive learning experience for me and i had a blast putting it together. there are probably some typos here and there, but i hope it's still fun to explore! you can read about the creation of flower manor within the game.

i will probably not be updating this anymore, so please have it in all its imperfect glory.
